I've already seen it.  And you forget the Inferno could always take 
another blank protoform.  It wouldn't count as reviving him more than 
once because he would have a different name and slightly varied 
personality (yes he does have some feelings aside from darkness but 
none of them are positive, such as I've decided to make him very 
lustful).

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> I meant that Azure won't stop until SS is either totally 
unconscieous 
> and hopelessly damaged (like until his spark is alive but useless) 
or 
> he is destroyed. for any additional infos, see his bio
>
